jokes:
Why was maths book sad? 
  Because it had too many problems.

I only know 25 letters of aplhabets 
  I don't know Y

What did the triangle say to the circle ? 
  You're pointless!

What did the tomato say to the other tomato during a race ? 
  Bro Ketch-up!

Husband quoted that ''My wife texted me this morning and said, 'Your great.' 
 I replied, 'No, you're great.'  
 She's been in a great mood ever since. I should correct her grammar more often.''
Jake used to have a job at a calendar factory, but he got fired because he took a couple of days off.

People say 'be yourself' ,
  Then they judge you for it. Classic.

A dumb person asked me for a joke  
 So I handed them a mirror.

If I had a dollar every time you said something usefulâ€¦  
 I'd  still be broke.

She: You remind me of null.
 He: Aww... mysterious? 
 She: No. Just empty and breaks everything I try to run.

She: You're like an old loop in my code. 
 He: Because you keep coming back to me? 
 She: HAHAHA! 
   (murmuring) Because I forgot to break you, and now I regret it.
facts: The first computer bug was an actual moth found in a machine in 1947.
Hot water freezes faster than cold water
Some jellyfish species can theoretically live forever.
Octopuses have three hearts. One stops when they swim.
Your brain generates about 20 watts of electricity.
'Dreamt' is the only English word that ends in the letters 'mt'

riddles.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go outside. What am I?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
I go up, but never come down. What am I?
You'll find me in Mercury, Earth, Mars, and Jupiter, but not in Venus or Neptune. What am I?
What comes down but never goes up?
What can you break without touching it or picking it up?
What has legs but doesn't walk?
